name: Trigger Happy
description: This is a DEATHMATCH ONLY WAD! It is a giant arena with two 'rings' around the outside of the center area. It has all of the guns except the Rocket Launcher and BFG, which would be way too unfair in a level this small. Believe me, you will get a WHOLE LOT of frags with three or four players! Happy DeathMatching!!!! :-) **Oh, and to see a cool two player DeathMatch between me and Veg-Man just wait a few seconds after you load up DOOM2 in single play to watch the demo. **
